item.title: Earth,Wind & Fire - After The Love Has Gone
item.description:
For awhile to love was
all we could do
We were young
and we knew
And our eyes
were alive
Deep inside we knew
our love was true
For awhile we paid
no mind to the past
We knew
love would last
Every night
somethin’ right
Would invite us
to begin the dance
Somethin’ happened
along the way
What used to be
happy was sad
Somethin’ happened
along the way
And yesterday was
all we had
And oh after
the love has gone
How could you
lead me on
And not let me
stay around
Oh oh oh after
the love has gone
What used to be
right is wrong
Can love that’s lost
be found
For awhile
to love each other
With all
we would ever need
Love was strong
for so long
Never knew that
what was wrong

wasn’t right
We tried to find
what we had
Till sadness was
all we shared
We were scared
this affair
Would lead
our love into
